rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a wheelchair accessible ramp leading to the central courtyard. Entry is designed for easy navigation and Vastu alignment.
Spacious Scandinavian living area with natural light and minimalistic design. Large windows face the central courtyard ensuring a connection with nature.
Functional dining space adjacent to the living room; features an open-plan layout promoting social interaction and wheelchair accessibility.
Compact yet efficient Scandinavian kitchen with accessible cabinetry. Integrated appliances and ample workspace maintain an uncluttered aesthetic.
Private bedroom with a serene view of the courtyard. Designed for relaxation and privacy while ensuring clear movement paths for wheelchair access.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom featuring grab bars, non-slip surfaces, and Vastu-aligned design elements to promote positive energy flow.
Dedicated servant's quarters with basic amenities. The space is designed for ease of access and privacy, following local building norms.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance leading directly to the courtyard and living areas. Vastu principles ensure positive energy.
Strategically placed windows for optimal natural light while maintaining privacy and aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Access points to the central courtyard providing a connection to nature; designed for wheelchair access.

rooms.description: An expansive central courtyard garden with wheelchair accessible pathways and seating areas. Incorporates Scandinavian design elements such as clean lines and natural materials.
